name: The Locator
text:
2 Monsters with different names
If this card is Link Summoned: you can add 1 monster that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set from your Deck to your hand. You can tribute 1 monster this card points to; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 monster from your hand to a zone this card points to but it cannot be used as Link Material. You can only use each effect of "The Locator" once per Duel.
